q1: How did Mexico do in the latest FIFA world cup?
q2: Mexico made it to the 12th position and 16th round
q3: Are they going to win the World Cup anytime soon?
a3: It is doubtful that they will win within the next few years without an entire restructure of the team.
q4: Do you think they also need a new and better coach?
a4: They seriously need a new coach and a younger squad
q5: Do you think they should look for a coach from Europe?
a5: Possibly, but there could be a just as good coach from anywhere else.
